casebody.data:
Vaughan Clavey, Defendant Below, Appellant, vs. Equitable Trust Company, a Corporation of the State of Delaware, Vaughan Clavey and George Lodge, Executors of the Last Will and Testament of Alfred D. Peoples, Deceased, Complainants Below, Appellees, Equitable Trust Company, a Corporation of the State of Delaware, Trustee Under the Last Will and Testament of Alfred D. Peoples, Deceased, Mary P. Huxley, Executrix of the Last Will and Testament of Rebecca Peoples Hall, Mary P. Huxley, Reba Hall Snyder, and Morris A. Stout, Defendants Below, Appellees. Supreme Court,

On Appeal,

September 28, 1942.

Layton, C. J., and Richards, Rodney, Speakman, and Terry, JJ., sitting.

C. A. Southerland, for appellant. John J. Morris, Jr., for appellee. Per Curiam.

The opinion of the Vice-Chancellor in the court below, and reported ante p. 55, 21 A. 2d 719, succinctly expresses the view of this court. This court adopts such opinion and upon it and the- stipulation of counsel filed in the record the decree of the court below is affirmed.
